original_text: For ye had compassion of me in my bonds, and took joyfully the spoiling of your goods, knowing in yourselves that ye have in heaven a better and an enduring substance.
korean_text: 너희가 갇힌 자를 동정하고 너희 소유를 빼앗기는 것도 기쁘게 당한 것은 더 낫고 영구한 소유가 있는 줄 앎이라

sentences.original_text: For ye had compassion of me in my bonds
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 내가 매였을 때 나를 불쌍히 여겼고

sentences.original_text: and took joyfully the spoiling of your goods
sentences.korean_translation: 기쁘게 너희 재산이 약탈당하는 것을 받아들였으며

sentences.original_text: a better and an enduring substance
